SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Grants mage armor to one unit for every 3 levels of the caster.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Does 10 exertion damage to the caster.
[ICON_BULLET]Hurls (level / 3) magic missiles.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Does 10 exertion damage to the caster.
[ICON_BULLET]Add Courage to a number of living units equal to 1/3 the caster's level.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Hire a buccaneer crew capable of better fighting (+25%) and potentially splitting off to form a boarding unit (1+1/4str of the ship). It takes 3 turns to find and train the crew.

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Add Dance of Blades to a number of units equal to the caster's level. +2 first strikes.
[ICON_BULLET]Add Enchanted Blade to a number of melee units equal to one third the caster's level.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Levels, strength, drill, mobility, sentry and burglar promotions help the outcome of exploring a lair be better...
Units that are not arcane or recon suffer feedback damage approximately (100 / (strength+level))%.
[ICON_BULLET]Add Hasted to a number of living units equal to the caster's level.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: [ICON_BULLET]Heals all living units on the tile 20% and removes poison.

SpellInfo.Help: Grant Valor, Courage, Blessed, Loyalty and Spirit Guide to all living units in the stack. At the end of the turn, they will travel on to the next life.
[ICON_BULLET]Add Loyalty to a number of living units equal to half the caster's level.
Does 1/lev% damage to all units within range 1 except the caster's tile, unless the caster has channeling3 in which case the damage is 2/lev% and range 2. Affects lev x 2 units, double if chan 3.
[ICON_BULLET]Summons a minor elemental whose strength is equal to 1 + caster's level / 2.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Does 10 exertion damage to the caster.
[ICON_BULLET]Add Regeneration to a number of living units equal to the caster's level.
Repair a number of Golem, Siege and Naval Units equal to 1/3 the caster's level 5% + 2% per caster level, slightly less the stronger the target.
[ICON_BULLET]Inflict 5+Lev% damage to lev x 2 units within 1 range. +Lev% damage if channeling 3.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Extinguish smoke and flames from adjacent tiles!
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Extinguish smoke and flames from adjacent tiles!

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Bring forth plains from the desert!
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Every (100/level) turns you may convert a desert tile to plains tile! Water2 is worth 5 levels, Water3 worth 10.
[ICON_BULLET]Inflict 5+1/lev% range 1 on water and adjacent tiles, 5+2/lev% range 2 if the caster has channeling 3.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Affects up to lev x 2 units, double if chan 3.

[ICON_BULLET]For every 8 units of a type, one can become chief gaining 1 strength and the ability to lead units! A unit must be at least level 5 to become a chief. This promotion will vanish when the unit is upgraded.
[ICON_BULLET]The most experienced unit of each class type may become a grand master if there are at least 25 units of like type existing in the world and the unit has attained level 8.

[ICON_BULLET]Give the leadership promotion (+30% str) to a number of allied troops equal to 1/2 the caster level + his nobility level.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Leadership I doubles the number of units. Leadership II triples, III quadruples.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The range for this is equal to the maximum number of units that can be affected / 8.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Sell a number of equipment items equal to your burglar promotions on this tile to the global market. (The longer time you take looking for buyers, the better price you will get. Fortify on the tile while looking for up to half your burglar skill.)
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Sell a number of equipment items equal to your burglar promotions on this tile to the global market. (The longer time you take looking for buyers, the better price you will get. Fortify on the tile while looking for up to half your burglar skill.)
[ICON_BULLET]Create a portal to which other teleporters can jump.
[ICON_BULLET]Find a path for yourself, a number of units equal to 1/2 your level or your level depending on your path finding skill.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Wilboman is capable of recruiting giants and ice giants to his civilization.
Strengthens all undead units in the plot for one turn by 10%.

In addition to direct damage spell spheres can cause special effect damage if the target is not magically shielded or resistant. Nature promotions give a 5%, 20%, 60% chance of poisoning a living target. Earth promotions can rust 5%, 15%, 45%. Body slows 5%, 15%, 45%. Entropy withers 2%, 6%, 18%. Death diseases 5%, 15%, 45% and plagues 2%, 5%, 15%. Sun, spirit and life blind 5%, 10%, 20%. Enchantment and mind charm 5%, 10%, 20%.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Fire an arcane attack at the most powerful enemy unit within range (1+extensions).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Units within cities suffer half damage.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The attack does 1% per level base damage modified by the relative strengths of the attacker and defender up to 5% per caster level max (3% per level for non-arcane casters).[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]In addition to direct damage spell spheres can cause special effect damage if the target is not magically shielded or resistant. Nature promotions give a 5%, 20%, 60% chance of poisoning a living target. Earth promotions can rust 5%, 15%, 45%. Body slows 5%, 15%, 45%. Entropy withers 2%, 6%, 18%. Death diseases 5%, 15%, 45% and plagues 2%, 5%, 15%. Sun, spirit and life blind 5%, 10%, 20%. Enchantment and mind charm 5%, 10%, 20%.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Examine the hidden cache to determine its secrets! If you have been fortified for 5 turns, there is a chance that you will be able to reduce the difficulty of the cache by 1 each time you examine it.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Examine the hidden cache. After 5 turns fortified, this could help reduce the difficulty of the cache.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Loot the cache! If you succeed, any guards will be creeps on the tile and you will gain the treasure. If you fail, the guards will be put on alert and possibly attack you. If you fail by more than 25%, you will suffer damage from the cache and the guards will attack you.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Loot the cache! If you succeed, any guards will be creeps on the tile and you will gain the treasure. If you fail, the guards will be put on alert and possibly attack you. If you fail by more than 25%, you will suffer damage from the cache and the guards will attack you.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Alert the cache guards to your presence and draw them away from the treasure. This will reduce the difficulty of looting the cache, if you can survive the guards!
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Alert the cache guards to your presence and draw them away from the treasure. This will reduce the difficulty of looting the cache, if you can survive the guards!

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Information you learn about caches is kept in your combat notes. You can learn more information about caches from cities. Basically, you can sense caches within your level up to 2 * your burglary skill away (drill, mobility and sentry promotions give +1 each). Fortifying (camping in the area to search more thoroughly) increases your skill one per turn up to half your base skill level. You can also get better information when you fortify longer. When using this skill in a city, you gain an additional range bonus equal to the population. A tavern in the city doubles your skill. HINT: If you are getting vague information after being fortified 5 turns, move around and try looking from different places fortified for a while. If you get close to a cache, the compass direction to the cache will begin to appear giving you a lot more ability to find it.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]You feel that their may be a hidden cache nearby. Use streetwise to ask the locals. Burglar1 will be accurate to within 2 tiles. Burglar2 one tile. Burglar3 reported distances will be accurate. If the cache is closer than your fortify turns, you will get directional information.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Information you learn about caches is kept in your combat notes. You can learn more information about caches from cities. Basically, you can sense caches within your level up to 2 * your burglary skill away (drill and sentry promotions give +1 each). Fortifying (camping in the area to search more thoroughly) increases your skill one per turn up to half your base skill level. When using this skill in a city, you gain an additional range bonus equal to the population. A tavern in the city doubles your skill. Distant treasure is out of your normal range, but you can learn a little about it from rumors.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]You feel that their may be a hidden cache nearby. Use streetwise to ask the locals...

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Blesses a number of units equal to half the caster's level plus three. Also, heals angel units by 10%, 25% if they are blessed with this action. Does nothing for undead and evil units.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Bless non-evil units equal to half the caster's level plus three. Heals angel units.
[ICON_BULLET]List the cities that you know of that need help with resolving disputes.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: When using diplomacy, non-living units cost double, recon units cost double and loyal units cost double. The more nobility promotions you have and the stronger your stack, the more chance diplomacy will work. The enemy unit is less likely to join if he has allied units within five spaces. Your noble may only hire units that have (level+str) equal to or less than his.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Attempt to hire an enemy unit equal or lower level than yourself for 15gp per (str+level). When using diplomacy, non-living, recon, animal, beast and loyal units cost double. The more nobility promotions you have and the stronger your stack, the more chance diplomacy will work. The enemy unit is less likely to join if he has allied units within five spaces. Your noble may only hire units that have (level+str) equal to or less than his.

[ICON_BULLET]Attempt to resolve a dispute in a city. The more nobility promotions, strength and supporting army you have the more chance you will succeed. You may attempt judging once per turn per noble.
[ICON_BULLET]List the cities that are paying maintenance with the amounts they are paying.
[ICON_BULLET]Heal a unit of roughly the same strength as the caster about 2% per caster level. Weaker units are healed proportionally more, stronger ones less.
[ICON_BULLET]Heal a unit of roughly the same strength as the caster about 2% per caster level. Weaker units are healed proportionally more, stronger ones less.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Sustains a summoned unit. The caster must have at least half as much strength as the unit to be sustained.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Sustains a summoned unit. The caster must have at least half as much strength as the unit to be sustained.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Make this high priest the patriarch of his religion. This will give a strength bonus and allow the unit to inspire the troops with him in battle.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Make this high priest the patriarch of his religion. This will give a strength bonus and allow the unit to inspire the troops with him in battle.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Make this privateer the Dread Pirate Roberts. This will give a strength bonus and allow the unit to inspire the ships with him in battle.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Make this privateer the Dread Pirate Roberts. This will give a strength bonus and allow the unit to inspire the ships with him in battle.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: The most experienced unit of each class type may become a grand master if there are at least 12 units of like type existing in the world and the unit has attained level 6.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Make this unit a grand master of his class.
[ICON_BULLET]Does 5-10% + 5x(lev+4-undead str+lev)% damage to 1 + 1/2 caster level undead units and gives them the blindness if it damages them.
[ICON_BULLET]Upgrade the archer's bow to use spider silk!

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Hire an adventurer from the tavern!
Allows a mage to gain a free promotion for 50gp times their channeling level plus 50gp. This also depletes the mage guild's supply.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Allows a mage to gain a free promotion for 50gp times their channeling level plus 50gp. This also depletes the mage guild's supply.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Retrieve adjacent equpiment, even on enemy tiles. You may retrieve a number of items equal to the number of burglar promotions you have.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Retrieve adjacent equpiment, even on enemy tiles.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Grants an extra life to one unit lower than 15 base strength at the cost of a life promotion from the caster.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Grants an extra life to one unit lower than 15 base strength at the cost of a life promotion from the caster.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: The Dragon Warrior is the highest level Cult of the Dragon unit in Erebus. To become the Dragon Warrior, you must be at least level 6. If a unit becomes the Dragon Warrior, the existing Dragon Warrior will cease to be the Dragon Warrior!
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]The Dragon Warrior is the highest level Cult of the Dragon unit in Erebus. To become the Dragon Warrior, you must be at least level 6. If a unit becomes the Dragon Warrior, the existing Dragon Warrior will cease to be the Dragon Warrior!

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: On the first turn, if the city size is greater than the xp of the unit you may purchase xp for units. The cost is 5gp per xp for the first 5, 10gp for each of the next 5 and so on.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Purchase XP for fast start units! 5gp per xp below 5, 10gp below 10, 15gp below 15, etc...

SpellInfo.Description: Recruit this worker into the war
SpellInfo.Civilopedia: When a settler or worker reaches 10xp, he may be recruited into the war.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]When a worker reaches 10xp, he may be recruited into the war.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: When a skeleton reaches 17xp, he may be armed as a skeleton warrior.
You may have half the number of caravels and larger ships you have. Boarding parties from more powerful ships are more powerful (Ship Attack/4+1).
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Rallies the sailors to go ashore or aboard the enemy's ship!

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Every seven years the Dragon Warrior can unleash a burst of pure awesomeness damaging and blinding all opponents within 2 tiles!
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Every seven years the Dragon Warrior can unleash a burst of pure awesomeness damaging and blinding all opponents within 2 tiles!

[ICON_BULLET]Teleport the caster and potentially passengers to a teleportal created by another mage or, if none exists, the capital city.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You may not teleport if charmed.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]The caster can teleport passengers equal to 1/4, 1/2 or equal to his level based on what level of dimensional training he has.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Visit the library to copy scrolls.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Visit the library to copy scrolls. (Magic Missile, Mage Armor, Summon Elemental and others)

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Visit the herbalist to purchase various potions.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Visit the herbalist to purchase various potions.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Visit the mage guild to purchase various scrolls and items.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Visit the mage guild to purchase various scrolls and items.

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Visit the craftsmen to purchase equipment.
Visit the alchemy lab to purchase potions.
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Visit the alchemy lab to purchase potions.
[ICON_BULLET]Restores ~(25/Str + 1/2 tile heal rate up to 10)% health to the user.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]4% chance of healing disease, 8% chance of healing poison.
[ICON_BULLET]Restores ~(50/Str + 1/2 tile heal rate up to 10)% health to the user.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]25% chance of healing disease, 50% chance of healing poison.
[ICON_BULLET]This will grant you the regeneration promotion.
[ICON_BULLET]Restores ~(100/Str + 1/2 tile heal rate up to 10)% health to the user.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Heals poison, 50% chance of curing a disease.
[ICON_BULLET]This will make the living user faster temporarily.
[ICON_BULLET]This will make the living user stronger temporarily.

SpellInfo.Description: Use the Potion of Enduring Strength
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]This will make you stronger. It has a 10% chance of wearing off each turn.

SpellInfo.Description: Use the Potion of Vampiric Blood Fury
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]This will give you vampiric qualities for one turn.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Magic Resistance
Use Magic Item Scroll of Magic Missile
Use Magic Item Scroll of Mage Armor
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Grants mage armor to (1/2 level + combat promotions) units.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Scroll of Summon Minor Elemental
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Summons a minor elemental whose strength is equal to 1 + caster's level / 2.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Summon Minor Elemental
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Summons a skeleton to aid the caster.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Flight
Use Magic Item Scroll of Fire Ball
Use Scroll of Summon Earth Elemental
SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Summons an earth elemental to aid the caster.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Summon Earth Elemental
SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Summons an earth elemental to aid the caster.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Crush

SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Create an explosion of lightning doing (level x 3) damage to all units within 3 tiles except the tile of the caster.

SpellInfo.Description: Use Magic Item Scroll of Lightning Burst
SpellInfo.Help: [ICON_BULLET]Create an explosion of lightning doing ( level x 3 ) damage to all units within 3 tiles.

SpellInfo.Description: Take the minor potion of experience...
Take the potion of enduring strength...
SpellInfo.Help: Take the potion of enduring strength...

SpellInfo.Description: Take the Potion of Vampiric Blood Fury...
Take the Scroll of Magic Resistance...
Take the Scroll of Magic Missile...
Take the Scroll of Mage Armor...
Take the Scroll of Summon Minor Elemental...
Take the Scroll of Fire Ball...
Take the Scroll of Lightning Burst...
Take the Scroll of Summon Earth Elemental...

SpellInfo.Civilopedia: Create a hunting and foraging place for the orcs in the jungle.
Repair Naval, Siege or (if dwarven) Golem units
SpellInfo.Help: Repair a number of (Golem if Dwarven), Siege and Naval Units equal to 1/3 the caster's level 5% + 2% per caster level, slightly less the stronger the target.
Allows the unit to fly, increases defense, but costs living units 10% damage per turn in endurance damage.
Allows the unit to fly, increases defense, but costs living units 10% damage per turn in endurance damage.

SpellInfo.Description: Add this unit to the Nobility
SpellInfo.Help: Cities with enough culture may add a unit to the nobility. This also occurs at 1000, 4000, 9000, 16000, 25000, 36000 and 49000 culture.
